description: Ramzan Kadyrov denies local reports he ordered the assassination of a Georgian journalist.
title: Ramzan Kadyrov denies Georgia journalist murder plot
title_page: Ramzan Kadyrov denies Georgia journalist murder plot - BBC News
maintext: It made no mention of the journalist or of Mr Kadyrov, and asked people not to spread "fake information" so they can "establish an objective truth in this case". Security services have asked for more information "through Interpol channels".
